member.summary: Textual representation of the result content.

member.name: T:BarcodeReaderLib.OpticalReaderTask
member.summary: Optical reader task is a Windows Phone chooser task implementation that allows easy and quick integration of 1D and 2D optical code reading functionality.

member.name: M:BarcodeReaderLib.OpticalReaderTask.Show
member.summary:
Show the optical reader viewfinder.
Application is navigated to a optical reader viewfinder page and the Completed event is fired when user either navigates away from the viewfinder or if an optical code is detected.
